title: Why do i get this??
body:
Preeeeetty sure this account is lvl 10, i have been using it to post things way back before the boards even existed...

and how come i only get this message on some threads and not on others?? its really annoying.

replies.body:
Hm, it shows that you're Level 9 in the client :o

http://puu.sh/n9FpT/b71169f4c8.jpg

Yea i know, which was really weird because i could have sworn it was once lvl 10

if that is the case though, how come i can post on the boards and have been doing so for so long?
how come it only bars me from some posts but not others?
Some sub-boards have different level posting requirements; this might be the reason why you're able to post in some places and not others.
it was lvl 10 in client, thats weird haha
